amendatorysection.catchline: Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center means a trauma center that (1) provides specialized care in the areas of burns or pediatrics, (2) is designated or verified by its professional association governing body, (3) provides continuous accessibility regardless of day, season, or patient's ability to pay, and (4) has entry access from each of the designation levels as its on-line physician or qualified physician surrogate deems appropriate.
